pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting Semi-Parametric Generalized log-Gamma Regression Models // Set of tools to fit a linear multiple or semi-parametric regression models. Under this setup, the localization parameter of the response variable distribution is modeled by using linear multiple regression or semi-parametric functions, whose non-parametric components may be approximated by natural cubic spline or P-splines. The supported distribution for the model error is a generalized log-gamma distribution which includes the generalized extreme value distribution as an important special case.
